document: SIMILARITIES AND DIFFERENCES BETWEEN AWARDEES AND NON-AWARDEES IN THE PENNSYLVANIA HIGHER EDUCATION ASSISTANCE AGENCY SCHOLARSHIP PROGRAM 1970-71.
